thread.title: President Obama Got Confirmation Jon Snow Is Really Dead
thread.title_full: President Obama Got Confirmation Jon Snow Is Really Dead

author: Stephanie Marcus
title: President Obama Got Confirmation Jon Snow Is Really Dead
text:
President Obama Got Confirmation Jon Snow Is Really Dead "Jon Snow is deader than dead." Stephanie Marcus Entertainment Editor, Huffington Post Posted: 07/10/2015 
At Comic-Con in San Diego on Friday, "Game of Thrones" director David Nutter revealed to Entertainment Weekly that he confirmed Snow's death to the President Barack Obama three weeks ago . 
“[President Obama] turned to me, put his hand on my shoulder, and said, ‘You didn’t kill Jon Snow, did you?’” Nutter told the website. “I said, ‘Jon Snow is deader than dead.'" 
There you have it, the confirmation we all needed to move on.
